SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T0.CardName AS 'Customer Name', TG.GroupCode AS 'Group Code', TG.GroupName AS 'Customer Group', T0.ObjType AS 'Object Type', T0.NumAtCard AS 'Customer Reference', T0.DocNum AS 'Document Number', T0.DocDate AS 'Transaction Date', T0.DocDueDate AS 'Due Date', T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>0 THEN T0.DocTotal-T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=60 THEN T0.DocTotal-T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=90 THEN T0.DocTotal-T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=120 THEN T0.DocTotal-T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days' FROM OINV T0 left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' and T0.CANCELED='N' UNION ALL SELECT T1.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T1.CardName AS 'Customer Name', TG.GroupCode AS 'Group Code', TG.GroupName AS 'Customer Group', T1.ObjType AS 'Object Type', T1.NumAtCard AS 'Customer Reference', T1.DocNum AS 'Document Number', T1.DocDate AS 'Transaction Date', T1.DocDueDate AS 'Due Date', T1.DocTotal - T1.PaidToDate AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=0 THEN T1.DocTotal - T1.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>0 THEN T1.DocTotal-T1.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=60 THEN T1.DocTotal-T1.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=90 THEN T1.DocTotal-T1.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=120 THEN T1.DocTotal-T1.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN T1.DocTotal - T1.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days' FROM ODPO T1 left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T1.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode WHERE T1.DocStatus = 'O' and T1.CANCELED='N') as ZZ WHERE ZZ.[Due Date]<=':2' and ZZ.[Customer Name] like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,ZZ.[Due Date], GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4 and ZZ.[Group Code]=:5) ORDER BY ZZ.[Customer Code],ZZ.[Object Type],ZZ.[Document Number],ZZ.[Due Date] ASC

SELECT T0.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T0.CardName AS 'Customer Name', TG.GroupName AS 'Customer Group', T0.ObjType AS 'Object Type', T0.NumAtCard AS 'Customer Reference', T0.DocNum AS 'Document Number', T0.DocDate AS 'Transaction Date', T0.DocDueDate AS 'Due Date', T0.DocTotal AS 'Invoice Amount', T0.PaidToDate AS 'Amount Paid', T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 60 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 90 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days', 1 AS 'Number' FROM OINV T0 left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' and T0.CANCELED='N' and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4 and TG.GroupCode=:5)
UNION ALL --Sub Total SELECT [Customer Code], [Customer Name], [Customer Group], 'SUBTOTAL' AS 'Object Type', NULL AS 'Customer Reference', NULL AS 'Document Number', NULL AS 'Document Date', NULL AS 'Due Date', SUM([Invoice Amount]) AS 'Invoice Amount', SUM([Amount Paid]) AS 'Amount Paid', SUM([Outstanding Balance]) AS 'Outstanding Balance', NULL AS 'Due Days', SUM([Not Due]), SUM([1-30 Days]) AS '1-30 Days', SUM([30-60 Days]) AS '30-60 Days', SUM([60-90 Days]) AS '60-90 Days', SUM([90-120 Days]) AS '90-120 Days', SUM([Over 120 Days]) AS 'Over 120 Days', 1 AS Number FROM (SELECT T0.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T0.CardName AS 'Customer Name', TG.GroupName AS 'Customer Group', T0.DocTotal AS 'Invoice Amount', T0.PaidToDate AS 'Amount Paid', T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 60 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 90 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) <= 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days' FROM OINV T0 left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' and T0.CANCELED='N' and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4 and TG.GroupCode=:5) )x GROUP BY [Customer Code],[Customer Name],[Customer Group]
UNION ALL -- Total SELECT NULL AS 'Customer Code', 'TOTAL' AS 'Customer Name', NULL AS 'Customer Group', 'TOTAL' AS 'Object Type', NULL AS 'Customer Reference', NULL AS 'Document Number', NULL AS 'Transaction Date', NULL AS 'Due Date', SUM(x.[Invoice Amount]) AS 'Invoice Amount', SUM(x.AmountPaid) AS 'Amount Paid', SUM(x.[Outstanding Balance]) AS 'Outstanding Balance', NULL AS 'Due Days', NULL AS 'Not Due', NULL AS '0-30 Days', NULL AS '30-60 Days', NULL AS '60-90 Days', NULL AS '90-120 Days', NULL AS 'Over 120 Days', 2 AS 'Number' FROM (SELECT SUM(T0.DocTotal) AS 'Invoice Amount', SUM(T0.PaidToDate) AS 'AmountPaid', SUM(T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate) AS 'Outstanding Balance' From OINV T0 left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode Where T0.DocStatus ='O' and T0.CANCELED='N' and DocDueDate<=':2' and T0.CardName like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4 and TG.GroupCode=:5) )x ORDER BY Number,T0.CardCode,T0.objtype,DocNum,T0.DocDueDate ASC

T0.PaidToDate AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=0 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>0 THEN T0.DocTotal-T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=60 THEN T0.DocTotal-T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=90 THEN T0.DocTotal-T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=120 THEN T0.DocTotal-T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T0.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days' FROM OINV T0 left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' and T0.CANCELED='N' UNION ALL SELECT T1.CardCode AS 'Customer Code', T1.CardName AS 'Customer Name', TG.GroupCode AS 'Group Code', TG.GroupName AS 'Customer Group', T1.ObjType AS 'Object Type', T1.NumAtCard AS 'Customer Reference', T1.DocNum AS 'Document Number', T1.DocDate AS 'Transaction Date', T1.DocDueDate AS 'Due Date', T1.DocTotal - T1.PaidToDate AS 'Outstanding Balance', DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())*-1 AS 'Due Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=0 THEN T1.DocTotal - T1.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Not Due', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>0 THEN T1.DocTotal-T1.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '1-30 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>30 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=60 THEN T1.DocTotal-T1.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '30-60 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>60 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=90 THEN T1.DocTotal-T1.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '60-90 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())>90 AND DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE())<=120 THEN T1.DocTotal-T1.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS '90-120 Days', CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(dd,T1.DocDueDate, GETDATE()) > 120 THEN T1.DocTotal - T1.PaidToDate ELSE 0 END AS 'Over 120 Days' FROM ODPO T1 left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T1.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode WHERE T1.DocStatus = 'O' and T1.CANCELED='N' ) as ZZ WHERE ZZ.[Due Date]<=':2' and ZZ.[Customer Name] like '%:1%' and ((DATEDIFF(dd,ZZ.[Due Date], GETDATE())*(-1)) Between :3 and :4 and ZZ.[Group Code]=:5) GROUP BY ZZ.[Customer Code], ZZ.[Customer Name], ZZ.[Group Code], ZZ.[Customer Group] ORDER BY ZZ.[Customer Name], ZZ.[Customer Code], ZZ.[Customer Group] ASC

DisplayList.valUnicode: All,Not Due,1-30 Days,31-60 Days,61-90 Days,91-120 Days,Over 120 Days
